features: File uploads: Upload files through web interface with drag-and-drop support.
Expiration settings: Set automatic expiration times for uploaded files to manage storage.
Password protection: Secure file links with passwords to restrict access to authorized users.
Public links: Generate shareable URLs for easy file distribution to others.
Download tracking: Monitor how many times files have been downloaded.
File management: View, organize, and delete uploaded files through the web interface.
Storage quotas: Configure maximum file sizes and total storage limits per user.
Guest uploads: Allow anonymous file uploads without requiring user accounts.
Multiple file upload: Upload multiple files simultaneously for efficient sharing.
API access: Programmatically upload and manage files using REST API endpoints.
Custom branding: Personalize the interface with logos and custom styling.
Access logs: Track file access and upload activity for security and auditing.
